entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with flurries near midnight and ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
